DOC.brief_summary: This is a dose-finding study; therefore, there is no hypothesis testing
DOC.brief_title: Dose Finding Study Of CP-870,893, An Immune System Stimulating Antibody, In Combination With Paclitaxel And Carboplatin For Patients With Metastatic Solid Tumors
DOC.criteria: Patients with metastatic solid tumors, for whom carboplatin and paclitaxel are appropriate; Patients >18 years of age; Good performance status; Adequate bone marrow and organ function Previous treatment with any other compound that targets CD40 Current or planned concurrent treatment with any anticancer agent; Patients who have received bone marrow transplant; History of autoimmune disorder History (within the previous year) of heart failure or heart attack Cancerassociated coagulation disorders
